 */export var UPDATE_PRODUCT_LIST_INFO='UPDATE_PRODUCT_LIST_INFO';export var UPDATE_INFO_LOAD_STATUS='UPDATE_INFO_LOAD_STATUS';/** @namespace Store/ProductListInfo/Action/updateProductListInfo */export var updateProductListInfo=middleware(function(products,filter){return{type:UPDATE_PRODUCT_LIST_INFO,products:products,selectedFilter:filter};},"Store/ProductListInfo/Action/updateProductListInfo");/**
 * Update loading status
 * @param {Boolean} status Loading indication boolean
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/ProductListInfo/Action/updateInfoLoadStatus
 */export var updateInfoLoadStatus=middleware(function(status){return{type:UPDATE_INFO_LOAD_STATUS,isLoading:status};},"Store/ProductListInfo/Action/updateInfoLoadStatus\n");
